      org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.AbstractEventTriggeringInterceptor

public abstract class AbstractEventTriggeringInterceptor
extends AbstractPersistenceEventListener

Invokes closure events on domain entities such as beforeInsert, beforeUpdate and beforeDelete.
